item.title: Presti is using GenAI to replace costly furniture industry photo shoots
item.description:
If you’ve ever bought a sofa online, have you thought about the homes you can see in the background of the product shots? When it’s time to release a new collection, furniture brands usually spend a small fortune on photo shoots. It’s a cumbersome and expensive process as it’s not easy to move furniture around. […]

item.description: XREAL, one of the leading companies in the XR glasses space, designed a phone that's 'not a phone' to help elevate your experience.

item.title: Ninja has way better Prime Day deals than Instant Pot
item.description: A ton of Ninja kitchen products are on sale the day before Prime Day, including record-low pricing on a Foodi air frying grill and Ninja Creami.

item.title: Prime Day Roomba deals are starting to trickle in
item.description: More Roombas should go on sale before Prime Day starts on July 16, but for now, snag the Roomba Combo i3+ for almost 50% off.

item.title: Robot vacuum deals at Amazon are booming going into the start of Prime Day
item.description: While Prime Day doesn't start until tomorrow, July 16, Amazon already has robot vacuums on sale. Get the iRobot j9+ for its lowest price ever or 50% off a self-emptying Shark.

item.title: Best Prime Day Echo deals: Amazon's smart home devices are falling to record-low prices

item.description: As of July 5, a few of Amazon's Fire Tablets are on sale ahead of Prime Day, although we think the deals will be much better when the event officially starts. Here are the best deals so far, including up to $95 off the Fire HD 10.
